price: Talaga ngang nag-iwan Kami nito bilang tanda, kaya may tagapag-alaala kaya?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
